de.weltraumschaf.jvfs.impl

Class JvfsPathMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.jvfs.impl.JvfsPathMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathMatcher

    final class JvfsPathMatcher
extends Object
implements PathMatcher
    Implementation to match paths. Supported syntax is either the standard Unix glob or java Regex syntax. This class implements simple methods to scan glob syntax. Implementation is copied from the Zip file example from Sun (com.sun.nio.zipfs.ZipFileSystem.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter , Xueming Shen

      • newMatcher

        static JvfsPathMatcher newMatcher(String syntaxAndPattern)
        Creates a new matcher. Syntax for parameter: "SYNTAX:EXPRESSION". For syntax use either GLOB_SYNTAX or REGEX_SYNTAX. As expression the according glob or Regex.
        Parameters:
        syntaxAndPattern - must not be null or empty
        Returns:
        never null

      • isGlobMeta

        private static boolean isGlobMeta(char c)
        Determines if given character is a glob syntax meta character.
        Parameters:
        c - any character
        Returns:
        true if it is a glob meta character, else false
